definition: section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: These are all the latest fashion.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是最流行的款式了。

sentences.english: The right style of swimsuit can help by hiding bulges .
sentences.chinese: 款式适当的游泳衣有助于掩饰肥胖部位。

sentences.english: A grading and styling design of garment pattern pieces is described in a top-down way.
sentences.chinese: 介绍服装样片分类和款式的自顶向下设计方法。

sentences.english: The lastest winter fashions are now on view in the big shops.
sentences.chinese: 最新的冬装款式现在正在大商店中陈列着。

sentences.english: Jeans with flared legs are popular this year.
sentences.chinese: 牛仔裤是喇叭口的款式，今年很流行。

sentences.english: Ann: Yes. President Hu was in the same style car on the National Day.
sentences.chinese: 是的，胡主席在国庆那天乘坐了同一款式的车。

sentences.english: Today, jeans come in many colors, styles and prices.
sentences.chinese: 今天，牛仔裤有很多色泽，款式和价格任你挑选。

sentences.english: We export ceramic tiles in various designs and colors, and also make samples and designs from you.
sentences.chinese: 我司出口陶瓷砖，款式色彩丰富，也可来样生产。

sentences.english: What do you think of this style， madam?
sentences.chinese: 女士，您觉得这个款式怎么样？

sentences.english: Style number 14362 is printed on the power pack packaging.
sentences.chinese: 款式号14362印在该电源的包装上。

sentences.english: This is the chinese traditional style and this is the individual exquisite photograph.
sentences.chinese: 这是中国传统的款式，这是个人的艺术照。

sentences.english: Prevailing fashions with vivid patterns and lively designs are the choice of stylish ladies.
sentences.chinese: 流行时装，图案生动，款式新颖，时髦女性的选择。

sentences.english: Avoid a dew shoulder, the fashion of bare breast.
This is the latest style , sell very well.
sentences.chinese: 这是最流行的款式，非常好卖。

sentences.english: These totes are reasonably priced, come in a variety of styles and colors.
sentences.chinese: 这些手提袋价格合理，有各种款式和颜色。

definition: to pair up/to match/to arrange in pairs/to add sth into a group
